items.title_en: Measuring AI agent autonomy in practice
items.title_zh: 在实践中衡量 AI 主体代理的自主性
items.summary_en: Anthropic presents metrics and experiments for evaluating how autonomous AI agents are in practice, clarifying safety implications for real-world use.
items.summary_zh: Anthropic 提出评估AI代理自主性的指标与实验，为实际应用中的安全风险提供了量化框架。

items.title_en: Silicon Valley engineers were indicted for allegedly sending secrets to Iran
items.title_zh: 硅谷工程师被起诉，涉嫌向伊朗传送机密
items.summary_en: Three Silicon Valley engineers were charged over allegedly sending secrets to Iran, underscoring ongoing insider-risk and export-control challenges for tech firms.
items.summary_zh: 三名硅谷工程师被起诉，涉嫌将机密信息发送至伊朗，突显科技公司在内部风险与出口管控方面的持续挑战。

items.title_en: Uncovering insiders and alpha on Polymarket with AI
items.title_zh: 用 AI 揭示 Polymarket 的内部人和先发信息
items.summary_en: It raises questions about market integrity, data ethics, and the responsible use of ML in finance.
items.summary_zh: 文章介绍用 AI 发现 Polymarket 的内部信息和早期信号，展示机器学习在预测市场中揭示隐藏模式的潜力。也提出对市场公正、数据伦理和在金融领域负责任使用 ML 的思考。

items.title_en: Zero downtime migrations at petabyte scale (2024)
items.title_zh: 在 PB 级规模下实现零停机迁移（2024）
items.summary_en: Planetscale outlines strategies for online schema migrations at petabyte scale, including tooling, testing, and rollback strategies to avoid downtime.
items.summary_zh: Planetscale 分享大规模规模级的在线架构迁移策略，覆盖工具链、测试与回滚方法，确保零停机。

items.title_en: Pi for Excel: AI sidebar add-in for Excel
items.title_zh: Pi for Excel：Excel 的 AI 侧边栏插件
items.summary_en: Pi for Excel adds an AI-powered sidebar to Excel, enabling quick data insights, natural-language prompts, and automation hooks inside spreadsheets. This signals how lightweight AI assistants integrated into familiar tools can boost productivity without leaving the app.
items.summary_zh: Pi for Excel 在 Excel 中增设了 AI 侧边栏，支持快速数据洞察、自然语言提示和工作流自动化接点。将 AI 助手无缝嵌入熟悉工具的趋势，提升工作效率且避免切换应用。

items.title_en: 24 Hour Fitness won't let you unsubscribe from marketing spam, so I fixed it
items.title_zh: 24 小时健身不让你退订营销邮件，我给它修复
items.summary_en: The author describes a fix to enforce unsubscribe controls for marketing emails from 24 Hour Fitness, highlighting a broader privacy-UX issue in consent flows and how institutions handle unsubscribes.
items.summary_zh: 作者修复了 24 小时健身的营销邮件退订流程，暴露了隐私与用户体验中的普遍问题：退订机制往往被复杂化或忽视。

items.title_en: Show HN: Mines.fyi – all the mines in the US in a leaflet visualization
items.title_zh: Show HN：Mines.fyi——用 Leaflet 展示美国所有矿山
items.summary_en: Mines.fyi visualizes all U.S. mines with a Leaflet-based interactive map, aggregating open data into a compelling geospatial view. It demonstrates how lightweight web tooling can reveal infrastructure and environmental context at scale.
items.summary_zh: Mines.fyi 通过基于 Leaflet 的交互地图将美国所有矿山可视化，汇聚开源数据呈现地理信息。该项目展示了轻量级网页工具在大规模地理信息与环境背景可视化中的应用潜力。

items.title_en: Old School Visual Effects: The Cloud Tank (2010)
items.title_zh: 古典视觉特效：云罐（Cloud Tank，2010）
items.summary_en: A look at the Cloud Tank visual effects technique from 2010 and its relevance to modern VFX workflows, showing how old tricks inspire contemporary CG.
items.summary_zh: 回顾2010年的 Cloud Tank 视觉特效技术及其对当代 VFX 工作流的启发，展示旧技艺如何影响现代 CG。

items.title_en: LibreOffice blasts OnlyOffice for working with Microsoft to lock users in
items.title_zh: LibreOffice 指责 OnlyOffice 与微软合作锁定用户
items.summary_en: LibreOffice blasts OnlyOffice for allegedly working with Microsoft to lock users in, raising concerns about interoperability, vendor lock-in, and the ethics of strategic partnerships in the open-source ecosystem.
items.summary_zh: LibreOffice 批评 OnlyOffice 与微软合作以锁定用户，质疑开源生态中的互操作性和厂商锁定问题。

items.title_en: Personal Statement of a CIA Analyst
items.title_zh: CIA 分析师的个人陈述
items.summary_en: A personal statement from a CIA analyst offers an insider perspective on intelligence work, including how analysis is framed, the pressures of secrecy, and the human aspects of decision-making.
items.summary_zh: 这篇来自 CIA 分析师的个人陈述提供了对情报工作的内部视角，涉及分析框架、保密压力以及决策过程中的人性因素。

items.title_en: How to Review an AUR Package
items.title_zh: 如何审查 AUR 软件包
items.summary_en: This guide covers practical checks for reviewing Arch User Repository packages, including PKGBUILD scrutiny, source integrity, licenses, dependencies, and reproducible builds. It emphasizes supply-chain awareness to reduce risk when installing AUR packages.
items.summary_zh: 这篇指南提供审查 Arch 用户存储库包的实用要点，包括对 PKGBUILD、源码完整性、许可证、依赖与可重复构建的检查，并强调在安装 AUR 包时的供应链安全意识。

items.title_en: Approaches to writing two-sentence journal entries
items.title_zh: 两句日记条目的写作方法
items.summary_en: Two-sentence journaling emphasizes concise reflection: one sentence to log events, a second to capture significance or lessons learned. The article outlines practical templates and prompts to help writers start quickly and maintain consistency.
items.summary_zh: 两句日记强调简洁反思：一条记录事件，另一条提炼意义或收获。文章给出实用模板和提示，帮助读者快速入手并保持一致性。

items.title_en: Coccinelle: The Linux kernel's source-to-source transformation tool
items.title_zh: Coccinelle：Linux 内核的源代码级转换工具
items.summary_en: Coccinelle automates source-to-source transformations for C, used to mass-refactor and patch the Linux kernel while preserving correctness. It lets maintainers express patterns and apply changes across large codebases safely and reproducibly.
items.summary_zh: Coccinelle 是一种用于 C 语言的源代码级转换工具，广泛用于对 Linux 内核进行自动化改动、重构和风格规范化。它通过模式匹配和脚本实现跨大代码库的可重复变更。

items.title_en: A psychedelic medicine performs well against depression
items.title_zh: 一种迷幻药治疗在抑郁症治疗上呈现积极结果
items.summary_en: A psychedelic medicine demonstrates promising results against depression, signaling a potential shift in mental health treatment options.
items.summary_zh: 一种迷幻药治疗在抑郁症治疗上呈现积极结果，预示心理健康治疗可能出现新的方向。

items.title_en: The true story behind the Toronto mystery tunnel (2015)
items.title_zh: 多伦多神秘隧道的真实故事
items.summary_en: Maclean's piece dives into the true story behind a Toronto mystery tunnel, unpacking how the tale started, who’s involved, and what investigators found. It sheds light on urban lore, criminal inquiry, and the social dynamics around underground spaces.
items.summary_zh: 这篇《麦克lean’s》报道讲述多伦多地下隧道传闻背后的真实经过，揭示事件起因、涉事人物与调查细节。报道从城市传说、司法调查和地下空间的社会反响等角度提供洞见。

items.title_en: EDuke32 – Duke Nukem 3D (Open-Source)
items.title_zh: EDuke32：Duke Nukem 3D 的开源实现
items.summary_en: EDuke32 is a modern open-source port of Duke Nukem 3D built on the Build engine, bringing updated rendering and cross-platform support to a classic shooter. It adds tooling for mods and expansions, inviting preservation-minded players and hobby developers to experiment with source code and assets.
items.summary_zh: EDuke32 是 Duke Nukem 3D 的开源移植，基于 Build 引擎，提供现代渲染和跨平台支持。它为模组和扩展提供工具，适合热爱复古游戏的玩家与开发者探索源码与资产。

items.title_en: Parse, Don't Validate and Type-Driven Design in Rust
items.title_zh: Rust 的“解析优先”与类型驱动设计
items.summary_en: Promotes parsing-first validation and type-driven design in Rust, arguing that the right types should encode invariants and that parsing should produce clean, well-formed data. The approach leverages Rust’s strong type system—newtypes, enums, and type-level guarantees—to reduce runtime validation and make API boundaries safer.
items.summary_zh: 提倡在 Rust 中采用解析优先的验证和类型驱动设计，即通过类型对不变量进行编码，让解析直接产出正确的数据结构。依托强类型系统（新类型、枚举、类型级保证）来减少运行时校验，使 API 边界更安全。

items.title_en: ShannonMax: A Library to Optimize Emacs Keybindings with Information Theory
items.title_zh: ShannonMax：用信息论优化 Emacs 快捷键的库
items.summary_en: ShannonMax introduces a library for optimizing Emacs keybindings using information theory, offering a principled approach to customization.
items.summary_zh: ShannonMax 推出一个利用信息理论优化 Emacs 快捷键的库，为自定义提供系统化方法。

items.title_en: Exercise has 'similar effect' to therapy, study on depression shows
items.title_zh: 运动对抑郁有类似治疗作用的研究显示
items.summary_en: A study finds exercise has a similar effect to therapy for depression, highlighting exercise as a low-cost, accessible mental health intervention alongside traditional treatments.
items.summary_zh: 研究发现运动对抑郁具有类似治疗的作用，凸显运动作为低成本、易获取的心理健康干预手段，与传统治疗相辅相成。

items.title_en: A chatbot's worst enemy is page refresh
items.title_zh: 聊天机器人最怕页面刷新
items.summary_en: Page refresh can wipe out chatbot context, breaking continuity in conversations. The piece argues for robust session persistence, local storage of dialogue state, and resilient UX patterns to maintain context across reloads.
items.summary_zh: 页面刷新会使聊天机器人丢失对话上下文，打断对话连贯性。文章主张加强会话持久化、本地存储对话状态，并采用对重载更具韧性的用户体验设计。

items.title_en: Microsoft team creates data-storage system that lasts for millennia
items.title_zh: 微软团队开发可持续千年的数据存储系统
items.summary_en: A Microsoft team proposes data storage technology aimed at ultra-long-term durability, capable of surviving millennia, highlighting the challenges and importance of archiving critical data.
items.summary_zh: 微软团队提出旨在实现超长期持久性的的数据存储技术，能够经受千年甚至更久的寿命，凸显持久存档的重要性与相关挑战。

items.title_en: Lindenmayer.jl: Defining recursive patterns in Julia
items.title_zh: Lindenmayer.jl：在 Julia 中定义递归模式
items.summary_en: Lindenmayer.jl exposes a compact DSL for defining L-systems in Julia, letting you encode recursive rewriting rules and render fractal-like patterns with minimal boilerplate. The package emphasizes readable syntax and integrates with Julia's plotting and numerical ecosystem, enabling quick experimentation with procedural growth and generative art. A handy tool for researchers and developers exploring recursive patterns or graphics in Julia.
items.summary_zh: Lindenmayer.jl 为在 Julia 中定义 L-系统提供了简洁的 DSL，使你能够用最少的样板代码表达递归重写规则并生成分形样式的图案。该包注重可读性语法，并可与 Julia 的绘图和数值计算生态无缝协同，便于快速尝试过程性生长和生成式艺术。对于在 Julia 中探索递归模式或可视化图形的研究者与开发者来说，是一款实用工具。

items.title_en: The Popper Principle
items.title_zh: 波普尔可证伪原则
items.summary_en: Revisits Popper's idea that science advances through falsification, applying the principle to modern tech debates about testing claims, evidence, and reproducibility in AI and software.
items.summary_zh: 回顾波普尔的可证伪性原则及其在当代科技话语中的应用，关注证据、可重复性与证伪性在 AI 与软件领域的意义。

items.title_en: Permacomputing
items.title_zh: 永续计算
items.summary_en: Permacomputing blends permaculture principles with computing to design sustainable tech ecosystems. It advocates energy-efficient hardware, distributed resilience, and open, community-driven maintenance to reduce e-waste and long-term costs. The field encourages critiquing growth-centric tech culture and exploring less resource-intensive deployment.
items.summary_zh: 永续计算将永续耕作的原则应用到计算领域，旨在设计更可持续的技术生态。它提倡使用节能硬件、分布式韧性以及开放、由社区推动的维护模式，以减少电子垃圾和长期成本。这一理念也在批判以增长为导向的科技文化，探讨资源占用更低的部署方案。

items.title_en: Minnesota judge holds federal attorney in civil contempt
items.title_zh: 明尼苏达一位联邦律师被裁定民事蔑视
items.summary_en: A Minnesota federal attorney is held in civil contempt, marking a notable courtroom development in immigration-related litigation.
items.summary_zh: 明尼苏达一位联邦律师被裁定民事蔑视，这是一起在移民相关诉讼中的重要法庭进展。

items.title_en: Fast KV Compaction via Attention Matching
items.title_zh: 通过注意力匹配实现快速 KV 压缩
items.summary_en: The paper proposes using attention matching to speed up compaction in key-value stores, reducing write amplification and improving throughput. If practical, it could influence how high-throughput databases design compaction pipelines.
items.summary_zh: 论文提出通过注意力匹配来加速 KV 存储的压缩整理，降低写放大并提升吞吐量。若落地，可能影响高吞吐数据库对压缩整理流水线的设计。

items.title_en: Meta Deployed AI and It Is Killing Our Agency
items.title_zh: Meta 部署 AI，正扼杀我们的代理机构
items.summary_en: Meta's rapid rollout of AI tools is disrupting traditional advertising and creative agencies that depend on human labor. As Meta automates content creation, targeting, and optimization, agencies must rethink value propositions—focusing on strategy, customization, and human creativity that AI can't easily replicate. This underscores how platform-level AI shifts can reshape an entire services business.
items.summary_zh: Meta 正在快速部署 AI 工具，扰动依赖人工劳动力的传统广告/创意代理模式。随着自动化的内容生成、投放优化等能力落地，代理机构被迫重新定位价值点，强调策略、定制化与人类创意等 AI 难以替代的优势。此事凸显了平台级 AI 如何改变服务行业的商业模式。

items.title_en: The Rediscovery of 103 Hokusai Lost Sketches (2021)
items.title_zh: 对北斎 103 幅失传草稿的再发现（2021）
items.summary_en: The 2021 rediscovery of 103 lost Hokusai sketches offers fresh insight into the artist’s process and catalog, illustrating how archival finds reshape art history and accessibility.
items.summary_zh: 2021 年重新发现的 103 幅失传草稿为北斎的创作过程和目录带来新洞见，展示了档案发现如何重塑艺术史与数字化获取。

items.title_en: A16Z partner says that the theory that we'll vibe code everything is ' wrong'
items.title_zh: A16Z 合伙人：‘把一切都编码化’的理论是错的
items.summary_en: An A16Z partner argues against the idea that everything can be coded and automated, stressing the continued importance of human judgment, creativity, and the limits of AI.
items.summary_zh: A16Z 合伙人反对“所有事情都能被编码并自动化”的观点，强调人类判断力、创造力以及 AI 的局限性仍然重要。讨论了如何在自动化与人工智慧之间取得平衡。

items.title_en: Building a model that visualizes strategic golf
items.title_zh: 构建一个可视化战略高尔夫的模型
items.summary_en: A model designed to visualize strategic golf decisions, likely analyzing shot choice, risk/reward, and course layout. This work illustrates how AI and visualization can translate sports strategy into actionable insights.
items.summary_zh: 该模型旨在将高尔夫中的战略选择以可视化方式呈现，可能覆盖出手决策、风险与收益评估及球场布局。展示了 AI 与可视化如何把体育策略转化为可执行的洞察。

items.title_en: The bare minimum for syncing Git repos
items.title_zh: 同步 Git 仓库的最小要点
items.summary_en: The article outlines a lean workflow for syncing Git repositories, focusing on essential commands and reducing friction in keeping forks and remotes aligned. It emphasizes simplicity and reliability over clever hacks.
items.summary_zh: 文章给出一个精简的 Git 仓库同步工作流，聚焦最小可行的命令集来让 fork/v 远端保持一致。强调简洁性和可靠性高于复杂取巧。

items.title_en: I Don't Like Magic
items.title_zh: 我不喜欢魔法式编程
items.summary_en: Reasoning against 'magic' in software, the post champions explicit, readable code and transparent behavior over clever abstractions.
items.summary_zh: 文章反对软件中的“魔法做法”，主张以明确、易读的实现和透明的行为来取代高深但不透明的技巧。

items.title_en: How an inference provider can prove they're not serving a quantized model
items.title_zh: 推断服务提供商如何证明自己未提供量化模型
items.summary_en: Outlines how an inference provider can prove it's not serving a quantized model, touching on model identity attestations and verifiable tests that demonstrate a model's original precision rather than compressed versions.
items.summary_zh: 讨论推断服务提供商如何证明自己未提供量化模型，涉及模型身份的可验证证明与测试，确保提供的是原始精度而非被量化的版本。

items.title_en: Gitas – A tool for Git account switching
items.title_zh: Gitas：Git 账户切换工具
items.summary_en: Gitas is a command-line tool to switch between multiple Git accounts by updating your identity and remotes per repository, reducing friction for developers who juggle personal and work identities.
items.summary_zh: Gitas 是一个命令行工具，用于在多个 Git 账户之间切换，通过更新仓库级的身份和远端配置来降低多账户管理的痛点。

items.title_en: Loon: A functional lang with invisible types, safe ownership, and alg. effects
items.title_zh: Loon：一种具备不可见类型、所有权安全与代数效应的函数式语言
items.summary_en: Loon presents a functional language with invisible types, safe ownership, and algebraic effects, exploring a design that aims to make effects easier to reason about without sacrificing performance.
items.summary_zh: Loon 提出一种函数式语言，特征包括不可见类型、所有权安全与代数效应，探讨让副作用更易推理的设计，同时保持性能。

items.title_en: Notes on Clarifying Man Pages
items.title_zh: 关于如何写清晰手册页的笔记
items.summary_en: Notes on clarifying man pages offer practical tips to improve clarity, structure, and usefulness of Unix manual entries.
items.summary_zh: 提供关于如何打造更清晰、结构良好的手册页的实用建议，聚焦清晰度与可用性。

items.title_en: Show HN: Iron-Wolf – Wolfenstein 3D source port in Rust
items.title_zh: Show HN：Iron-Wolf——用 Rust 实现的 Wolfenstein 3D 源码移植
items.summary_en: Rust-based source port of the classic Wolfenstein 3D demonstrates how modern language safety and ecosystem can revive retro games. Iron-Wolf focuses on clean code, portability, and potential performance gains, offering a case study in Rust-driven game porting. The project also shows the balance between authenticity and safety in emulation-like efforts.
items.summary_zh: 基于 Rust 的经典 Wolfenstein 3D 源码移植展示了现代语言的安全性与生态系统如何促成复古游戏的再现。Iron-Wolf 注重代码整洁、可移植性，以及潜在的性能提升，成为 Rust 驱动的移植案例。该项目也揭示了在保真度与安全性之间寻求平衡的挑战。

items.title_en: Famous Signatures Through History
items.title_zh: 历史上的著名签名
items.summary_en: Take a look at historically famous signatures from rulers, authors, and innovators. The strokes, flourishes, and seals tell stories about authenticity, status, and the era's signing habits, offering quick lessons in document forensics and provenance. In a digital age, it contrasts with cryptographic signatures that aim to guarantee integrity and non-repudiation.
items.summary_zh: 这组历史著名签名覆盖了各领域的统治者、作者与创新者。笔势、花饰和印章揭示签署的真实性、地位与时代风格，提供文献鉴定和出处追溯的直观案例。相比之下，当下数字签名与密码学证明追求的是同样的可信性，但以全新机制实现。

items.title_en: A solver for Semantle
items.title_zh: 为 Semantle 设计的求解器
items.summary_en: A solver for Semantle demonstrates strategies to maximize semantic similarity guesses, using vector representations and search techniques.
items.summary_zh: 为 Semantle 设计的求解器展示了通过向量表示与搜索策略来提升语义相似度猜测的思路。

items.title_en: Show HN: A small, simple music theory library in C99
items.title_zh: Show HN：一个用 C99 编写的简洁音乐理论库
items.summary_en: Compact, dependency-free C99 library that implements core music theory concepts: notes, intervals, scales, and chords. It emphasizes a small footprint and easy embedding for projects like games or demos, offering a lightweight alternative to heavier DSP or music libraries.
items.summary_zh: 这个极小、无依赖的 C99 音乐理论库实现了核心音乐理论要素，如音符、区间、音阶和和弦。旨在便于嵌入到小游戏或演示类项目，提供一个轻量的替代方案，免去对大型库的依赖。

items.title_en: University of Texas limits on teaching of "unnecessary controversial subjects"
items.title_zh: 德州大学限制教授“不必要的有争议科目”
items.summary_en: UT Regents restrict teaching of controversial subjects, raising concerns about academic freedom and curriculum scope in Texas universities.
items.summary_zh: 德州大学理事会限制教授“可能引发争议的科目”，引发对学术自由与课程范围的担忧。

items.title_en: Toyota Mirai hydrogen car depreciation: 65% value loss in a year
items.title_zh: 丰田 Mirai 氢动力车一年内贬值65%
items.summary_en: Despite high-tech hype, the Mirai's depreciation illustrates the volatility of early hydrogen vehicles: a 65% drop in value within a year underscores market skepticism, infrastructure gaps, and consumer demand dynamics.
items.summary_zh: 尽管氢燃料车技术备受关注，Mirai 一年的贬值率达到 65%，凸显市场对氢能源车的信心不足、充氢/加氢基础设施不足以及需求波动。

items.title_en: The Nekonomicon – Nekochan.net Archive, Updated
items.title_zh: Nekonomicon – Nekochan.net 存档更新
items.summary_en: An updated Nekonomicon archive preserves more of Nekochan.net's retro computing discussions, guides, and references. The refresh makes historical content more accessible for researchers and nostalgia fans, offering a snapshot of early online tech culture. It underscores how community archives illuminate the evolution of hardware hacking and open-source conversations.
items.summary_zh: Nekonomicon 存档更新保留了 Nekochan.net 的复古计算讨论、指南和参考资料的更多内容。此次更新让历史内容对研究者和怀旧爱好者更易获取，提供了早期科技社区的一个缩影。它强调社区存档如何揭示硬件黑客与开源对话的演变。

items.title_en: Grok Exposed a Porn Performer's Legal Name and Birthdate–Without Being Asked
items.title_zh: Grok 暴露色情演员的真实姓名与出生日期——未被请求
items.summary_en: A report on doxxing a porn performer's real name and birthdate, raising ethical concerns around privacy and data protection online.
items.summary_zh: 报道讨论对色情表演者真实姓名与出生日期进行的公开号码披露事件，凸显网络隐私与数据保护的伦理问题。

items.title_en: KFC, Nando's, and others ditch chicken welfare pledge
items.title_zh: 肯德基、Nando’s 等取消鸡肉福利承诺
items.summary_en: Fast-food chains drop positive welfare pledges amid cost pressures, signaling a real-world challenge to maintaining public animal-welfare commitments in supply chains.
items.summary_zh: 在成本压力下，快餐连锁纷纷放弃鸡肉福利承诺，反映出供应链环境下公开承诺的现实性与执行难度。

items.title_en: Tesla has to pay historic $243M judgement over Autopilot crash, judge says
items.title_zh: 特斯拉因自动驾驶判赔2.43亿美元
items.summary_en: A jury verdict orders Tesla to pay $243 million related to an Autopilot crash, underscoring legal risk in autonomous features and the need for rigorous safety accountability in consumer EVs.
items.summary_zh: 陪审团裁定特斯拉就一起自动驾驶相关车祸赔偿2.43亿美元，凸显自动化功能的法律风险与对消费者交通安全责任的关注。

items.title_en: Inputlag.science – Repository of knowledge about input lag in gaming
items.title_zh: Inputlag.science：游戏输入延迟知识库
items.summary_en: This repository aggregates knowledge about gaming input lag, covering measurement methods, testing setups, and practical guidance to reduce latency for both hardware and software. The collection helps developers, testers, and competitive gamers understand and improve perceived responsiveness.
items.summary_zh: 该知识库汇总了游戏输入延迟的测量方法、测试流程，以及降低延迟的实用建议，涵盖硬件与软件多方面。为开发者、测试人员和竞技玩家提供理解并提升响应性的参考。

items.title_en: Continuous batching (2025)
items.title_zh: 连续分批（持续分批）技术（Continuous batching）
items.summary_en: Continuous batching (2025) explains how continuous batching techniques boost throughput for large-scale inference, combining streaming data with micro-batching and pipeline parallelism.
items.summary_zh: 连续分批（持续分批）技术用于提升大规模推理的吞吐量，将数据以流式方式分批处理，并结合流水线并行，带来实际的性能提升。

items.title_en: SwiftForth IDE for Windows, Linux, macOS
items.title_zh: SwiftForth IDE：跨 Windows/Linux/macOS 的 Forth 集成开发环境
items.summary_en: SwiftForth IDE is now available on Windows, Linux, and macOS, unifying the Forth development experience across desktop platforms. The cross-platform IDE bundles editor, compiler, and debugger, making it easier for hobbyists and embedded developers to work with Forth. As a niche language, uptake depends on community and use cases.
items.summary_zh: SwiftForth IDE 现已在 Windows、Linux、macOS 上可用，为 Forth 开发者提供统一的编辑、编译与调试体验的跨平台工具链。对挖掘嵌入式和复古计算场景的开发者尤具吸引力，更多取决于社区规模与实际需求。

items.title_en: Can random experimental choice lead to better theories?
items.title_zh: 随机实验选择能否带来更好的理论？
items.summary_en: The paper discusses whether introducing randomness into experiments can yield better theories, blending philosophy of science with experimental design.
items.summary_zh: 文章探讨将随机性引入实验是否能促成更好的理论，结合科学哲学与实验设计。

items.title_en: Visible Spectra of the Elements
items.title_zh: 元素的可见光谱
items.summary_en: An interactive resource visualizes emission spectra of elements, bridging chemistry with visual understanding of light. It has practical value for spectroscopy, astrophysics, and science education.
items.summary_zh: 该资源通过互动方式可视化元素的发射光谱，将化学与光的直观理解联系起来，对光谱学、天体物理和科普教育具有实际价值。

items.title_en: Understanding Std:Shared_mutex from C++17
items.title_zh: 深入理解 C++17 的 std::shared_mutex
items.summary_en: std::shared_mutex lets multiple readers access data concurrently while writers gain exclusive access, enabling more scalable read-heavy code.
items.summary_zh: std::shared_mutex 允许多个读取者并发访问数据，同时写入者获得独占访问，能显著提高读密集型场景的并发性。文章讲解了其 API（lock_shared、unlock_shared、lock）及实际用法要点，并警示了死锁和性能权衡等注意事项。

items.title_en: When etcd crashes, check your disks first
items.title_zh: etcd 崩溃时先检查磁盘
items.summary_en: The post argues that disk issues—corruption, full disks, or I/O bottlenecks—are frequent root causes of etcd outages. It recommends starting diagnostics at the storage layer before blaming the cluster, with practical checks and remediation steps.
items.summary_zh: 文中指出 etcd 崩溃的常见根因往往来自磁盘层的问题，如数据损坏、磁盘已满或 I/O 瓶颈。建议优先从存储层诊断并给出实际排查与修复步骤。

items.title_en: Palantir Captured the UK Ministry of Defence
items.title_zh: Palantir 获得英国国防部大单
items.summary_en: Palantir secures a major contract with the UK Ministry of Defence, underscoring the growing role of private vendors in national security. The deal spurs debate over data sovereignty, vendor lock-in, and the influence of AI-driven decision support.
items.summary_zh: Palantir 获得英国国防部的重要合同，凸显私营企业在国家安全领域的角色，同时引发对数据主权和 AI 辅助决策的讨论。

items.title_en: Level of Detail
items.title_zh: 细节层次（LOD）
items.summary_en: An exploration of level-of-detail considerations in design/graphics, discussing when to simplify versus preserve detail for clarity and performance.
items.summary_zh: 探讨在设计与图形中的细节层次，阐述何时简化、何时保留细节以兼顾清晰度与性能。

items.title_en: zclaw: personal AI assistant in under 888 KB, running on an ESP32
items.title_zh: zclaw：在 ESP32 上运行、仅 888 KB 的个人 AI 助手
items.summary_en: Shows a personal AI assistant that runs on an ESP32 within 888 KB, demonstrating the feasibility of ultra-lightweight AI in embedded devices. The project highlights the engineering trade-offs between memory, latency, and offline capability.
items.summary_zh: 展示在 ESP32 上仅 888 KB 的个人 AI 助手的实现，证明极小体积的 AI 也能在嵌入式设备上运行。该项目揭示了内存、延迟和离线能力之间的取舍。

items.title_en: Canvas_ity: A tiny, single-header <canvas>-like 2D rasterizer for C++
items.title_zh: Canvas_ity：一个极小、单头文件的 C++ 2D 光栅化库
items.summary_en: Canvas_ity is a tiny, single-header 2D rasterizer for C++, offering a Canvas-like API with minimal dependencies. It's suitable for tiny demos, educational projects, or embedding in tools where keeping the build simple matters.
items.summary_zh: Canvas_ity 是一个极小的、单头文件的 C++ 2D 光栅化库，提供类似 Canvas 的接口且依赖极少。非常适合小型演示、教学项目或需要简单构建的新工具。

items.title_en: Palantir partnership is at heart of Anthropic, Pentagon rift
items.title_zh: Palantir 与 Anthropic 的伙伴关系在五角大楼分歧中居核心
items.summary_en: The article connects Palantir's involvement with Anthropic to tensions in the Pentagon relationship, revealing how big tech partnerships shape defense AI choices.
items.summary_zh: 报道指出 Palantir 与 Anthropic 的关系在五角大楼关系紧张中扮演核心角色，反映大型科技企业对国防 AI 选择的影响。

items.title_en: Asbestos is a bigger problem than we thought [video]
items.title_zh: 石棉问题比我们想象的更严重 [视频]
items.summary_en: A video highlights how asbestos risks may be larger than previously understood, prompting safety awareness and policy discussion.
items.summary_zh: 视频警示石棉风险可能高于以往的认知，促使人们关注安全与相关政策。

items.title_en: HUD proposes rule that would force noncitizens from public housing
items.title_zh: HUD 提出规章强制非公民在公共住房中的规定
items.summary_en: HUD proposes rules affecting noncitizens in public housing, stirring debate over immigration policy and housing access.
items.summary_zh: HUD 提出影响非公民在公共住房中的规定，引发对移民政策与住房准入的讨论。

items.title_en: How to Stop Being Boring
items.title_zh: 如何摆脱无聊
items.summary_en: Practical steps to stop being boring include building new habits, cultivating curiosity, and injecting novelty into projects. The guidance is especially relevant for engineers seeking more engaging daily work.
items.summary_zh: 给出实用步骤来走出无聊：培养新习惯、激发好奇心，并在项目中注入新鲜感。内容对寻求提升日常工作趣味的工程师尤为有用。

items.title_en: I'm Sick of This AI Shit [video]
items.title_zh: 我厌倦了这个 AI 的玩意儿 [视频]
items.summary_en: A candid video expressing fatigue with AI hype and progress, offering a skeptical take on current AI trends and their practical impact.
items.summary_zh: 一段直言不讳的视频，表达对 AI 热潮与进展的疲惫与怀疑，对当前趋势及实际影响提出批判性看法。

items.title_en: The #1 most downloaded skill on OpenClaw marketplace was malware
items.title_zh: OpenClaw 市场最受欢迎的技能居然是恶意软件
items.summary_en: The top downloaded skill on the OpenClaw marketplace is malware, underscoring security concerns and the need for platform safeguards.
items.summary_zh: OpenClaw 市场最受欢迎的技能竟是恶意软件，凸显安全风险与平台监管的必要性。

items.title_en: SwiftUI Agent Skill: Build Better Views with AI
items.title_zh: SwiftUI Agent 技能：用 AI 构建更好的视图
items.summary_en: Explores using AI agents to assist in building SwiftUI views, boosting productivity and design quality with practical examples.
items.summary_zh: 探讨利用 AI Agent 辅助 SwiftUI 视图的构建，提供实际案例以提升效率与界面质量。

items.title_en: Chris Lattner: Claude C Compiler
items.title_zh: Chris Lattner：Claude C 编译器
items.summary_en: A Modular blog post about the Claude C compiler, revealing how AI-enabled language tooling can influence software development, compiler design, and safety guarantees. It suggests a future where AI helps produce more reliable, tractable builds.
items.summary_zh: Chris Lattner 讨论 Claude C 编译器及其对软件未来的启示，强调 AI 辅助语言设计、编译器安全性与可验证性的重要性。

items.title_en: Large Language Model Reasoning Failures
items.title_zh: 大型语言模型推理失败
items.summary_en: The paper surveys common reasoning failure modes in large language models, including hallucinations and brittle step-by-step reasoning. Understanding these weaknesses is essential for safe deployment and for guiding future research into robust AI reasoning.
items.summary_zh: 论文梳理了大型语言模型推理中的常见失败模式，如幻觉、链式推理的不稳定性以及评估偏差。认识这些问题对安全部署和未来改进推理能力至关重要。

items.title_en: OpenAI Employees Raised Alarms About Canada Shooting Suspect Months Ago
items.title_zh: OpenAI 员工数月前已对加拿大枪击嫌疑人发出警报
items.summary_en: OpenAI employees reportedly raised alarms about a Canada shooting suspect months before the incident, highlighting tensions between internal risk signals and public-facing safeguards. The story raises questions about how AI companies monitor safety concerns, escalate issues, and incorporate employee insights into policy.
items.summary_zh: 据报道，OpenAI 员工数月前就加拿大枪击嫌疑人发出警报，揭示内部风险信号与对外安全措施之间的张力。此事引发关于 AI 公司如何监测安全风险、升级告警、以及将员工意见纳入政策制定的讨论。

items.title_en: Testing Super Mario Using a Behavior Model Autonomously
items.title_zh: 使用行为模型对 Super Mario 进行自主测试（Part 1）
items.summary_en: The post shows how to autonomously test Super Mario using a behavior-model approach, detailing setup and methodology for automated game testing. It highlights how model-driven testing can accelerate AI and game research.
items.summary_zh: 文中演示如何利用行为模型对 Super Mario 进行自主测试，介绍了自动化测试的设置与方法论。强调以模型驱动的测试在 AI 与游戏研究中的应用潜力。

items.title_en: Spell Checking a Year's Worth of Hacker News
items.title_zh: 对一整年的 Hacker News 进行拼写检查
items.summary_en: Spell-checking a year's worth of Hacker News data demonstrates data-cleaning at scale, improving data quality for analysis and search tasks.
items.summary_zh: 对整整一年的 Hacker News 数据进行拼写检查，展示了大规模数据清洗对分析与检索的帮助。

items.title_en: Reproducible and traceable configuration for Conan C and C++ package manager
items.title_zh: Conan C/C++ 包管理器的可复现与可追溯配置
items.summary_en: Describes strategies to achieve reproducible and traceable configurations with Conan, likely via lockfiles and pinned dependencies. This helps teams ensure deterministic builds and easier debugging for C/C++ projects.
items.summary_zh: 介绍在 Conan（C/C++ 包管理器）中实现可复现与可追溯配置的方法，通常通过锁文件固定依赖关系。目标是让构建具确定性、调试更高效，并提升可追溯性。

items.title_en: Lessons learned from `oapi-codegen`'s time in the GitHub Secure Open Source Fund
items.title_zh: 从 oapi-codegen 在 GitHub 安全开源基金中的经历学到的教训
items.summary_en: Lessons from hosting oapi-codegen in GitHub's Secure Open Source Fund touch on governance, funding constraints, and aligning OSS projects with security goals.
items.summary_zh: 分享将 oapi-codegen 纳入 GitHub 安全开源基金的经验教训，涵盖治理、资金限制以及与安全目标的一致性等要点。

items.title_en: The Software Development Lifecycle Is Dead
items.title_zh: 软件开发生命周期已死
items.summary_en: The Software Development Lifecycle Is Dead argues traditional SDLC is outdated; teams should embrace continuous delivery, rapid iteration, and cross-functional ownership to keep pace with modern software needs.
items.summary_zh: “软件开发生命周期已死”认为传统的 SDLC 已不再适用，企业应拥抱持续交付、快速迭代与跨职能协作以跟上现代软件开发节奏。

items.title_en: JWasm: Masm Compatible Assembler
items.title_zh: JWasm：与 MASM 兼容的汇编器
items.summary_en: JWasm provides MASM-compatible assembly syntax and tooling, enabling Windows-style assembly development under modern toolchains. It helps port legacy code or implement high-performance routines using familiar syntax.
items.summary_zh: JWasm 提供与 MASM 语法兼容的汇编器，使在现代工具链上进行 Windows 风格的汇编开发成为可能，便于移植遗留代码或实现高性能例程。

items.title_en: Gabriel Knight 3: Blood of the Sacred, Blood of the Damned
items.title_zh: Gabriel Knight 3：圣血与诅咒之血
items.summary_en: Gabriel Knight 3: Blood of the Sacred, Blood of the Damned looks back at the late-90s adventure game's storytelling, puzzle design, and use of FMV to drive immersion. It discusses how the title balanced investigative gameplay with cinematic presentation, and how those choices aged over time. The retrospective also touches on preservation and what modern indie titles can learn from its ambition.
items.summary_zh: 《Gabriel Knight 3：圣血与诅咒之血》回顾了这款90年代末冒险游戏的叙事、谜题设计以及对全动作视频（FMV）的运用以提升沉浸感。它分析了游戏如何在调查推进和电影化呈现之间取得平衡，以及这些选择随着时间的推移如何经受考验。文末还讨论了保存与复兴这一经典的意义，以及现代独立游戏设计可能从中汲取的经验。

items.title_en: Type-based alias analysis in the Toy Optimizer
items.title_zh: 该教程/博文在 Toy Optimizer 中探索基于类型的别名分析
items.summary_en: A toy optimizer explores type-based alias analysis techniques, offering insights into how language-level typing can aid optimization and memory safety.
items.summary_zh: 该教程/博文在 Toy Optimizer 中探索基于类型的别名分析，展示类型系统如何帮助优化与内存安全。

items.title_en: Excessive token usage in Claude Code
items.title_zh: Claude Code 的代币使用过量问题
items.summary_en: The issue notes that Claude Code consumes tokens at an unusually high rate, increasing cost and latency for users. Potential remedies include prompt optimization, shorter contexts, and efficient routing.
items.summary_zh: 报道指出 Claude Code 的代币消耗异常偏高，导致使用成本与延迟上升。可能的解决办法包括改进提示设计、缩短上下文、提升路由效率等。

items.title_en: Phil Spencer Retiring, Sarah Bond Out, Asha Sharma Named New Xbox Boss
items.title_zh: Phil Spencer 退休，Sarah Bond 离任，Asha Sharma 新任 Xbox 负责人
items.summary_en: A leadership reshuffle at Xbox with Phil Spencer’s retirement and Sarah Bond departing, paired with Asha Sharma taking over. The change could steer strategy toward new priorities in gaming experiences, AI features, and developer relations.
items.summary_zh: Xbox 进行领导层调整，Phil Spencer 退休、Sarah Bond 离任，Asha Sharma 上任。此举或将把战略重点转向游戏体验、AI 功能与与开发者关系的新方向。

items.title_en: The Chinese periodic table goes hard [video]
items.title_zh: 中国元素周期表硬核来袭 [视频]
items.summary_en: An energetic video presenting the periodic table with bold visuals and rapid animations. It demonstrates how design and storytelling can make chemistry concepts more engaging and memorable for learners.
items.summary_zh: 一段充满冲击力的视频，使用大胆的视觉效果和快速动画来呈现元素周期表。它展示了设计与叙事如何提升化学知识的吸引力，使学习更易记忆且激发观众的科学兴趣。

items.title_en: Netbase: A port of the NetBSD utilities for Linux
items.title_zh: Netbase：将 NetBSD 的实用工具移植到 Linux
items.summary_en: Netbase ports NetBSD utilities to Linux, helping developers familiar with NetBSD tooling work on Linux environments.
items.summary_zh: Netbase 将 NetBSD 的实用工具移植到 Linux，便于熟悉 NetBSD 工具链的开发者在 Linux 上工作。

items.title_en: Lexega Turns SQL into Signals
items.title_zh: Lexega 将 SQL 转换为信号
items.summary_en: Lexega turns SQL into signals that feed analytics or models, enabling data-driven decisions from existing SQL workloads. It reduces data wrangling and accelerates insight generation.
items.summary_zh: Lexega 将 SQL 转换为可供分析模型使用的信号，从现有的 SQL 负载中提取洞察，降低数据清洗成本并加速洞察产出。

items.title_en: How were video transfers made? (2011)
items.title_zh: 如何实现视频传输？（2011）
items.summary_en: A historical discussion about how video transfers were handled around 2011, covering formats, transfer pipelines, and the practical challenges of digitizing and distributing video before modern streaming.
items.summary_zh: 回顾 2011 年前后的视频传输技术，讨论当时的 formats、压缩与传输流程，以及在现代流媒体普及之前实现数字化和分发所面临的实际挑战。

items.title_en: Fast Sorting, Branchless by Design
items.title_zh: 快速排序：设计为无分支
items.summary_en: Discusses sorting algorithms designed to be branchless for performance and security reasons, reducing branch mispredictions and leakage risk.
items.summary_zh: 介绍为提升性能与安全性而设计的无分支排序算法，减少分支预测错失和潜在信息泄露的风险。

items.title_en: Choose Your Fictions Well (2010)
items.title_zh: 谨慎选择你的虚构
items.summary_en: Henry Jenkins' 2010 meditation on media literacy argues audiences should critically curate the fictions they trust in a media-saturated landscape. Its insights remain relevant for evaluating AI-generated content and online narratives.
items.summary_zh: 亨利·詹金斯 2010 年的媒体素养思考强调读者应谨慎地筛选信任的虚构内容，在信息泛滥的时代保持批判性。该观点对于评估 AI 生成内容以及在线叙事仍具现实意义。

items.title_en: FBI 'Asset' Helped Run a Dark Web Site That Sold Fentanyl-Laced Drugs for Years
items.title_zh: FBI 线人协助运营长期售卖芬太尼药物的暗网站点
items.summary_en: An FBI asset aided in operating a dark-web marketplace that sold fentanyl-laced drugs for years, raising serious questions about undercover tactics, accountability, and public safety in cybercrime policing.
items.summary_zh: 一名 FBI 线人协助运营一个长期售卖芬太尼混合药物的暗网市场，引发对卧底行动、问责与网络犯罪打击中公共安全问题的讨论，凸显相关道德矛盾。

items.title_en: Phil Spencer is exiting Microsoft as AI executive takes over Xbox
items.title_zh: Phil Spencer 将离职，AI 高管接管 Xbox
items.summary_en: Microsoft confirms leadership shake at Xbox as Phil Spencer exits and an AI executive takes the helm, signaling a strategic shift toward integrating AI capabilities with gaming. Expect impacts on product roadmap, cloud services, and developer relations.
items.summary_zh: 微软宣布 Xbox 高层人事变动，Phil Spencer 离任，由 AI 高管掌舵，表明将把 AI 能力融入游戏生态。预期对产品路线、云服务和开发者关系产生影响。

items.title_en: Tensions between The Pentagon and AI giant Anthropic reach a boiling point
items.title_zh: 五角大楼与 Anthropic 的紧张关系升级
items.summary_en: Rising tensions between the Pentagon and Anthropic over AI safety, access to government work, and defense-related policy highlight the broader friction between national security needs and commercial AI.
items.summary_zh: 五角大楼与 Anthropic 在 AI 安全、政府合同及相关政策上的分歧升级，凸显国家安全需求与商业 AI 之间的张力。

items.title_en: Show HN: Write native binary web apps with TypeScript and Express
items.title_zh: Show HN：用 TypeScript 与 Express 构建原生二进制网络应用
items.summary_en: Show HN features writing native binary web apps with TypeScript and Express, illustrating an alternative path to distributing JavaScript-based apps as native binaries.
items.summary_zh: Show HN 展示了用 TypeScript 与 Express 构建原生二进制网络应用的思路，展示了将 JS 应用打包为原生二进制的一条替代路径。

items.title_en: MeshTNC is a tool for turning consumer grade LoRa radios into KISS TNC compatib
items.title_zh: MeshTNC：将消费级 LoRa 无线电转化为 KISS TNC 兼容设备的工具
items.summary_en: MeshTNC enables turning consumer-grade LoRa radios into KISS TNC-compatible devices, bridging modern wireless hardware with traditional HAM radio workflows. It opens avenues for experimentation and retro-computing projects.
items.summary_zh: MeshTNC 让消费级 LoRa 无线电设备也能兼容 KISS TNC，连接现代无线硬件与传统业余无线电工作流。为实验和复古计算相关项目打开了新路径。

items.title_en: ATAboy is a USB adapter for legacy CHS only style IDE (PATA) drives
items.title_zh: ATAboy：用于遗留 CHS/IDE（PATA）硬盘的 USB 适配器
items.summary_en: ATAboy is a USB adapter that connects legacy CHS/IDE drives to modern systems, enabling data recovery and access to old disks. It showcases ongoing resilience of older hardware interfaces.
items.summary_zh: ATAboy 是一款 USB 适配器，能够让旧式 CHS/IDE（PATA）硬盘连接到现代系统，便于数据恢复。它体现了早期接口在现代环境中的持续可用性。

items.title_en: Do you want to build a community where users search or hang? (2021)
items.title_zh: 你想打造一个以搜索还是停留为核心的社区吗？（2021）
items.summary_en: Examines the trade-offs between building a community around searchable content versus user engagement and hangout culture, drawing lessons from 2021 to guide product design.
items.summary_zh: 探讨在社区产品中：是以可搜索内容为核心，还是以用户互动与停留为核心；结合 2021 年的经验给出设计与运营的启示。

items.title_en: Colorado moves age checks from websites to operating systems
items.title_zh: 科罗拉多将年龄验证从网站迁移至操作系统
items.summary_en: Colorado moves age checks to OS level, enabling devices to prove user age without sites implementing verification themselves. This could streamline compliance and enhance privacy, but raises concerns about OS market power, accessibility, and how trust is established across apps and browsers.
items.summary_zh: 科州计划把年龄验证放到设备操作系统层来处理，让应用不再需要在每个网站单独验证年龄。此举或简化合规并提升隐私，但也引发对操作系统垄断、无障碍性以及跨应用信任机制的担忧。

items.title_en: Show HN: PIrateRF – Turn a $20 Raspberry Pi Zero into a 12-mode RF transmitter
items.title_zh: PIrateRF：用 20 美元的 Raspberry Pi Zero 实现 12 模式射频发射
items.summary_en: PIrateRF shows how a $20 Raspberry Pi Zero can drive a 12-mode RF transmitter, turning a cheap board into a versatile RF project. It demonstrates the feasibility of hobbyist-grade hardware for experimenting with radio signals and modulation schemes.
items.summary_zh: PIrateRF 展示了用 20 美元的 Raspberry Pi Zero 驱动一个具备 12 种模式的射频发射器，体现了廉价开发板在无线信号与调制方案实验中的可行性。

items.title_en: The Claude C Compiler: What It Reveals About the Future of Software
items.title_zh: Claude C 编译器：它揭示了软件未来的哪些趋势
items.summary_en: The Claude C compiler analysis discusses what it implies about software tooling, language design, and future compilation strategies.
items.summary_zh: 对 Claude C 编译器的分析揭示了软件工具、语言设计及未来编译策略的趋势。

items.title_en: A Famous Enigma: On Alexandre Kojève
items.title_zh: 名著之谜：解读 Alexandre Kojève
items.summary_en: This exploration of Kojève delves into the French philosopher's interpretation of Hegel and his influence on 20th-century political thought, including the reception of his ideas in Cold War-era intellectual circles. It sheds light on how Kojève helped shape debates on history, sovereignty, and liberalism.
items.summary_zh: 本文解读 Kojève 的思想，聚焦他对黑格尔的解读及其对20世纪政治思想的影响，尤其在冷战时期知识分子圈中的传播与讨论。揭示他如何影响历史观、主权与自由主义的辩论。

items.title_en: Show HN: Agent Passport – OAuth-like identity verification for AI agents
items.title_zh: Show HN：Agent Passport——AI 代理的 OAuth 式身份验证
items.summary_en: Agent Passport provides an OAuth-like identity framework for AI agents, enabling secure authentication and cross-tool collaboration. It helps prevent impersonation and improves auditability in multi-agent setups.
items.summary_zh: Agent Passport 提供类似 OAuth 的 AI 代理身份验证框架，支持跨工具协作中的安全认证与授权。提升多代理系统的防伪能力与可审计性。

items.title_en: Denonomicon: The Dark Arts of Deno Foreign Function Interface Programming
items.title_zh: Denonomicon：Deno 的 FFI 编程的黑暗艺术
items.summary_en: Denonomicon surveys Deno's foreign function interface programming, outlining strategies, pitfalls, and best practices for safe and ergonomic FFI usage.
items.summary_zh: Denonomicon 介绍 Deno 的 FFI 编程，梳理安全、易用的实践、常见坑点与最佳实践。

items.title_en: Show HN: Script Snap – Extract code from videos
items.title_zh: Show HN：Script Snap—从视频中提取代码
items.summary_en: Script Snap extracts code shown in videos into editable text, helping developers salvage snippets from tutorials that aren't easily copyable. It combines OCR with code-aware parsing to improve accuracy, though success depends on video quality and formatting. This could accelerate learning and reuse of demonstrated techniques.
items.summary_zh: Script Snap 能将视频中显示的代码提取为可编辑文本，方便从教学视频中回收无法直接复制的代码片段。它结合 OCR 与代码识别，准确性受画面清晰度和排版影响。此工具有助于学习与复用视频中的示例代码。

items.title_en: Shai-Hulud-Style NPM Worm Hijacks CI Workflows and Poisons AI Toolchains
items.title_zh: Shai-Hulud 风格的 NPM 蠕虫劫持 CI 工作流并污染 AI 工具链
items.summary_en: Shai-Hulud-Style NPM Worm hijacks CI workflows and taints AI toolchains, illustrating how supply-chain attacks can compromise build pipelines and downstream tooling.
items.summary_zh: Shai-Hulud 风格的 NPM 蠕虫劫持持续集成工作流并污染 AI 工具链，揭示供应链攻击对构建管线和下游工具的风险。

items.title_en: DialUp95 – A 90s inspired nostalgia hit
items.title_zh: DialUp95：一部90年代风格的怀旧作品
items.summary_en: DialUp95 recreates the look and feel of a 1990s internet experience, with dial-up sounds, chunky UI, and intentionally slow-loading sequences. It's a playful nostalgia project for designers and developers curious about historical UX and skeuomorphism. The project also reminds how internet infrastructure shaped early online experiences and design decisions.
items.summary_zh: DialUp95 重现了1990年代上网的视觉与交互体验，包含拨号音效、粗犷的界面和故意缓慢的加载。对于对历史用户体验和拟物设计感兴趣的设计师与开发者来说，这是一个有趣的怀旧项目。它也让人回想起当年网络基础设施如何影响早期的在线体验与设计选择。

items.title_en: Ask HN: Programmable Watches with WiFi?
items.title_zh: Ask HN：带 WiFi 的可编程手表？
items.summary_en: Ask HN: Programmable Watches with WiFi? discusses feasibility, power budget, security considerations, and potential use cases for smartwatches with network connectivity.
items.summary_zh: Ask HN：带 WiFi 的可编程手表可行吗？讨论了网络连接、功耗、安全性与潜在应用场景等问题。

items.title_en: Instant AI Response
items.title_zh: Instant AI Response 实时 AI 回复
items.summary_en: Instant AI Response presents a tool for near-instant AI replies, likely offering a quick, responsive interface for generating AI-based answers and prototyping chat experiences.
items.summary_zh: Instant AI Response 提供近乎即时的 AI 回应能力，可能为快速查询和原型化对话体验提供简洁的界面。

items.title_en: WebMCP App for Composing Music
items.title_zh: WebMCP 作曲应用
items.summary_en: WebMCP App for Composing Music introduces a web-based music composition tool built on the WebMCP framework, illustrating how accessible online tooling can support creative workflows and collaboration.
items.summary_zh: WebMCP 作曲应用是一个基于 Web 的音乐创作工具，展示了在线协作与创造性工作流的新方式。

items.title_en: Show HN: An e-ink air traffic monitor built with Cloudflare Workers
items.title_zh: Show HN：用 Cloudflare Workers 构建的电子纸空中交通监控显示器
items.summary_en: A DIY e-ink air traffic monitor updates live aircraft data via Cloudflare Workers, demonstrating edge computing-powered dashboards with minimal power use. It showcases how lightweight web workers can drive practical hardware displays.
items.summary_zh: 一个自制的电子纸空中交通监控显示器通过 Cloudflare Workers 实时更新航班数据，演示了基于边缘计算的低功耗仪表板。展示了轻量级 Web 工作流在实际硬件显示中的应用潜力。

items.title_en: Online Pebble Development
items.title_zh: Pebble 在线开发
items.summary_en: Online Pebble Development provides browser-based development for Pebble apps, enabling testing and iteration without local tooling.
items.summary_zh: Online Pebble Development 提供浏览器中的 Pebble 应用开发与测试环境，方便开发者在无需本地工具的情况下进行试验。

items.title_en: NSA and IETF, Part 6
items.title_zh: NSA 与 IETF 第六部分
items.summary_en: NSA and IETF, Part 6 continues examining the interaction between intelligence agencies and standards bodies, highlighting governance, security, and potential concerns about influence on cryptography.
items.summary_zh: NSA 与 IETF 第六部分继续探讨情报机构与标准化机构之间的互动，聚焦治理、安全性以及对密码学标准的潜在影响担忧。

items.title_en: Show HN: Fostrom, an IoT Cloud Platform built for developers
items.title_zh: Show HN：为开发者打造的物联网云平台 Fostrom
items.summary_en: Fostrom presents a developer-focused IoT cloud platform, likely offering device management, data routes, and edge compatibility with a simple API. This kind of project showcases how lean IoT backends can compete with hyperscale offerings when developer experience is prioritised.
items.summary_zh: Fostrom 是一个面向开发者的物联网云平台，提供设备管理、数据路由和边缘计算兼容等能力，API 设计简洁。此类项目证明了在重视开发者体验时，轻量级物联网后端也能与大厂云方案竞争。

items.title_en: Toggle: A simple and keyboard friendly graphics drawing tool
items.title_zh: Toggle：一个简单且键盘友好的绘图工具
items.summary_en: Toggle is a keyboard-friendly graphics drawing tool that aims for fast, distraction-free sketching with minimal UI and focused keyboard workflows.
items.summary_zh: Toggle 是一个以键盘为核心的简洁图形绘制工具，追求快速无干扰的绘图体验，界面简洁、操作以键盘为主。
